A preservative against popery. [Parts 1-2.] being some plain directions to unlearned Protestants, how to dispute with Romish priests, the first part / by Will. Sherlock ... Sherlock, William, 1641?-1707.
[2], 90, [6], 91, [2] p.
Printed for William Rogers ..., London : M DC LXXXVIII [1688].
Separate t.p.: The second part of the preservative against popery, shewing how contrary popery is to the true ends of the Christian religion ... / by William Sherlock ... -- London : printed for William Rogers ... 1688. "Books lately printed for Will. Rogers": p. [91]-[92] at end of first part. "Books lately printed for W. Rogers": p. [1] at end of second part. Errata: p. 91. Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======
